name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lawrence SHERRELL, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lawrence SHERRELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John J. Dean, Anthony J. Lalama, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Louis R. Paulick, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
368 A.2d 269
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lawrence SHERRELL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 20, 1976.
Decided April 28, 1977.
John J. Dean, Anthony J. Lalama, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Louis R. Paulick, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
